system.notes: Bulky Installation, projects force wall out 3 metres. Ranged attacks within 3 metres, and any melee attacks are unaffected by field.  Visibly glows and crackles, giving -40 to Stealth while active. This version is equipped in vechiles or inside small buildings. Ranged can be modified but also varies power usage. [AP: 80%]
